title: A linear variant of the nearly Gorenstein property
abstract:
The nearly Gorenstein property is a generalization of the Gorenstein
property. In this paper, we introduce a new property $(\natural)$ that extends
the nearly Gorenstein property in semi-standard graded rings. We show
$(\natural)$ relates to a property in affine semigroup rings and generalizes
results on Veronese subrings. Furthermore, $(\natural)$ and the nearly
Gorenstein property are equivalent in Ehrhart rings of $(0,1)$-polytopes with
the integer decomposition property and in rings with minimal multiplicity.
